title: The Dow Rose 46 Points Because of Mixed Earnings and Mixed Signals on Trade, Brexit
text:
Finding Directions. Stocks ended Wednesday with slight gains after whipsawing throughout the day. Third-quarter earnings keep flowing in, and the results are mixed. A preliminary trade deal between the U.S. and China is still expected for November, although Vice President Mike Pence’s China speech tomorrow adds a measure of uncertainty. The U.K. is waiting for the EU to extend the Brexit deadline, again, while the five-day cease-fire in northern Syria has ran out today. In today’s After the Bell, we...

look at the latest earnings reports and the market’s indecisive reactions; wonder whether Pence will dial back...
description: Stocks ended Wednesday with slight gains after whipsawing throughout the day. Third-quarter earning have been mixed.
